table.name: vtiger_cbsodetails
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_cbsodetails` ( `cbsodetailsid` INT(11) NOT NULL, `cbsodetailsno` VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT NULL, `salesorder_no` VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT NULL, `quantity` DECIMAL(11) DEFAULT NULL, `unit_price` DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT NULL, `pricebook` INT(40) DEFAULT NULL, `iva` DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT NULL, `total` DECIMAL(16,2) DEFAULT NULL, `description` VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT NULL, `subject_reference` VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT NULL, `product` INT(40) DEFAULT NULL, `sequence_num` DECIMAL(11) DEFAULT NULL, `vat_value` DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT NULL, `master_order` INT(40) DEFAULT NULL, `rate` DECIMAL(3,2) DEFAULT NULL, `descriptive_note` VARCHAR(56) DEFAULT NULL, `unit` DECIMAL(11) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`cbsodetailsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_cbsodetailscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_cbsodetailscf` ( `cbsodetailsid` INT(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`cbsodetailsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
